error.message: Parameter $number_formatter_factory of method Drupal\price\Plugin\Field\FieldFormatter\PriceModifiedDefaultFormatter::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\price\NumberFormatterFactoryInterface: Replaced by CurrencyFormatterInterface.
The "price.number_formatter_factory" service is deprecated. You should use the 'price.currency_formatter' service instead. See http://drupal.org/node/the-change-notice-nid
Class Drupal\price\TwigExtension\PriceTwigExtension extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_SimpleFilter: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\TwigFilter" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
